data.text: @jabybear Hi, jaja. We are a full-service airline. You may check our website for our ongoing travel deals and seat sales you can enjoy with your family and friends! Please visit https://t.co/WddWdir4ae for more details.

@Danlar85 We're sorry for the inconvenience, DanL. We'll have your feedback noted for service enhancements. Should you need assistance, you may approach any PAL representative. Thank you.

@Danlar85 Hi, DanL. Please be informed that the airline does not have any control over the travel requirements imposed by government authorities. Our advisories only serve as guide. Kindly adjust your settings on Twitter so we can send you a direct message. Thank you.

data.text: @cg_tres You're welcome!
@cg_tres Yes, you can bring a laptop bag, Tres.
@cg_tres A carry-on bag that exceeds the allowed weight or dimension shall be intercepted and charged an Excess Baggage Charge (EBC), if applicable. (2/2)

@cg_tres Hi, Tres. Each passenger is allowed one piece of carry-on baggage small enough to be placed in the overhead bin or under the passenger seat of the aircraft cabin with a maximum total dimension of  56cm x 36cm x 23cm (22in x 14in x 9in)  and maximum weight of 7 kg (15 lbs).(1/2)
@xuanyi0330 We're truly sorry for the inconvenience, Xuan. We've requested for another follow-up with our Baggage Department. We will get back to you for news.
@cg_tres Hi Tres. May we ask for the dimensions of the item?
@archie_es We have sent you a DM. Thank you.

@syjohnny Hi, Johnny. We’re sorry if you experience some issues with our website. Here is a quick troubleshooting guide we advise you to try.
(1) Clear your browsing history, cache, and cookies
(2) Use a different browser or device
(3) Book via our App 

Thank you.

@Danlar85 Hi, DanL. May we know further details of your concern so we can look into this? We've tried sending you a DM but your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly adjust your settings on Twitter so we can send you a direct message. Thank you.

urls.title: Fill | myPAL Request Hub
urls.description: Booking requests at your fingertips. The myPAL Request Hub provides passengers with convenient servicing options. Through this secure online form, you can request the following transactions wherever you are: • Rebook due to schedule change, travel restrictions, or cancellations • Convert your Ticket to a Travel Credit • Exchange your Travel Voucher to a ticket • Request for refund • Follow-up on an existing request You can use this online facility in 3 easy steps: 1. Fill out the form 2. Click SUBMIT 3. Receive a confirmation via email Important Reminders: • For more information on your booking change options, visit https://bit.ly/PALPassengerOptions page. • For tickets issued by our partner travel agents, requests on booking changes must be made through your issuing travel agent. • myPAL Request Hub can assist requests for changes to confirmed bookings on Philippine Airlines flights which were made through the PAL Website, PAL Mobile App, PAL Ticket Offices, or PAL’s Reservations Hotl

data.text: @_AB0MHMD This is noted, @_AB0MHMD. May we also know if you already sent a refund request via our myPAL Request Hub: https://t.co/BZr4lAPcft?

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text: @cdynamite Hi univrs. We have no advisory regarding this yet. Kindly check our website https://t.co/ePCV23PQfZ, or follow our social media accounts, so that you'll be updated the moment we release advisories on new developments.
@kweencurtojales You're welcome!
@kweencurtojales You're welcome. Yes, you can bring a small personal bag, a laptop bag and a 7kg carry-on.
@kweencurtojales Hi! You can bring more than 1 bag as long as the total weight will not exceed 30kg.
@iammissprudent We have sent you a DM, Annie. We will do our best to help you.

- clear browsing history, cache, and cookies
- use a different browser or device
- use a different payment method

Thank you.
@valeros_kaye We are truly sorry for this, Kaye. We have requested for the assistance of our Baggage Team and will provide you with updates once received. Thank you.

@ronaldcarl Hello, Ronald. We regret to learn of your baggage concern. May we know if you were in coordination with the terminating station in this regard? Thank you.

@Dakilanggelpren - a reasonable amount of reading material
- duty free bag
- infant's food for consumption in flight
- pair of crutches and/or braces, walking sticks and other prosthetic devices for the passenger's use provided that the passenger is dependent upon them

Thank you.

(3/3)

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text:
@Dakilanggelpren In addition to the free carry-on baggage allowance, a passenger is allowed to carry on-board a maximum of any two (2) of the following items:

- a small handbag
- pocket book or purse
- an overcoat, wrap or blanket
- a small camera or binoculars
- laptop with case

(2/3)
